jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain web applications, collaborate with the design team to enhance user experience.
jobs.requirements: Proficient in JavaScript, experience with React and Node.js, understanding of REST APIs.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Analyze datasets, generate reports to support decision-making, and identify trends.
jobs.requirements: Proficient in SQL and Python, experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Manage project timelines, communicate with stakeholders, and ensure project goals are met.
jobs.requirements: Experience in project management, knowledge of Agile methodologies, strong communication skills.

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
jobs.description: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns, analyze market trends to adjust strategies.
jobs.requirements: Experience with SEO/SEM, proficiency in marketing tools like Google Analytics, strong analytical skills.

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Design user interfaces and improve user experience for mobile and web applications.
jobs.requirements: Experience with Figma or Adobe XD, understanding of user-centered design principles.
